content.text: 0) In a large mixing bowl, cream the shortening and sugar.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "cream"@27:32 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the shortening"@33:47 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "sugar"@52:57 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large mixing bowl"@6:25 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Beat in the egg and molasses.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Beat in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "the egg"@11:18 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "molasses"@23:31 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Combine flour, baking soda, ginger, cinnamon and salt; gradually add to creamed mixture.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Combine"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "flour"@11:16 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "baking soda"@18:29 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "ginger"@31:37 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "cinnamon"@39:47 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "salt"@52:56 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "add"@68:71 / AC
		:ppt ( "creamed mixture"@75:90 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Roll teaspoonfuls of dough into balls.
4) Dip one side of each ball into sugar; place with sugar side up on a greased baking sheet.
5) Bake at 350 degrees F for 12-15 minutes or until lightly browned and crinkly.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:heat ( temp-5-0 "350 degrees F"@11:24 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-5-0 "12-15 minutes"@29:42 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-5-0 "until lightly browned and crinkly"@46:79 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
